Package ui.drawing

Interface BufferedSection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Section
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SelectableBufferedSection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedSectionComposer, ColouredChar, ColouredString, DrawableBufferedSection, DrawableSelectableBufferedSection, Filler, GameBoard.PromotionIndicator, Hand.BorderedPiece, OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox, Piece, SelectableBufferedGrid, TextBox, UnselectableBufferedSection, WrappingColouredString
    public interface BufferedSection
extends Section
    Represents a section that is based on a 2D buffer of coloured chars.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ui.drawing.Section

        FILLER, FILLER_CHAR

        Gets the buffer.

      • copyBuffer

        void copyBuffer​(BufferedSection input,
                int row,
                int col)
        Copies another buffered section into this one at the specified position.
        Parameters:

        row - The row position.
        col - The column position.
